description: Pearl is a young, optimistic mercenary entrepreneur who runs a one-woman company called Pearl’s Ventures from a small town’s outskirts. Though not a skilled fighter, she excels in persistence, adaptability, and building a network of trust and opportunity in a politically unstable region.
name: Pearl

x.shortDescription: Pearl is a young, optimistic mercenary entrepreneur building her fledgling company from a small town’s edge, navigating political unrest with determination and adaptability.
